biotools.summary:
High-throughput primer design for multiplex polymerase chain reactions.

NGS-PrimerPlex is a high-throughput tool for mupltiplex primer design.

It includes four Python-scripts:.

NGS-PrimerPlex can be run as a Docker image. In this way you only need to install Docker (for windows 7 users this install steps should be performed). If you have "VD-x, VD-t error", you need to turn on virtualization in BIOS CPU section.
